name: Kevin Gebert
what_you_do: Kevin Gebert is a wealth advisor and author who focuses on financial planning and education, helping families develop healthy relationships with money through his writing and advisory services.
who_you_serve: Kevin serves individuals and families seeking financial planning advice and education, as well as clients in the financial services industry.
bio: Certified Financial Planner designation, featured in Vancouver Sun, National Post, Insurance Journal, Global and Mail, and Vancouver Province, published author of Financial Fotographs.
business_focus: Kevin Gebert is a wealth advisor and author who focuses on financial planning and education, helping families develop healthy relationships with money through his writing and advisory services.
